channel.title: Commission-free Trading on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Commission-free Trading on FinanClub

item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:-61 Chances: Shares of Robinhood (HOOD) jumped 7.3% in the afternoon session after major indices rose. The Federal Open Market Committee guided three rate cuts in 2024, in line with market expectations. Robinhood has launched commission-free trading throughout the U.K., which could potentially boost its revenue.
